review: I had booked appointment for my mother for ENT concern and visited the clinic. Dr. Varsha was very good and she had listen all the concern of my mother carefully, after that treatment was given. We are fully satisfied by this doctor and her treatment, so I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and other. In clinic we have received all positive response.

I had scheduled appointment for my family member in Vegus clinic for ENT concern and we have visited it. Dr. Varsha was very friendly and kind with us, and did our complete check up, after that some test and medicine were given to take. We had not face any difficult in our appointment. As very thing was fine, I would like to recommend this doctor for other so that it would be helpful.
